Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-25112 affecting package exiv2 for versions less than 0.28.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-25112 affecting package exiv2 for versions less than 0.28.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package exiv2 is earlier than 0.28.3-1, affected by CVE-2024-25112
